venue.name: Windham Rail Trail - Windham Depot Entrance

item.description:
Let's get out and enjoy this beautiful weather by waking the Windham Rail Trail!

We will start out at a moderate pace heading towards Salem and see how far we get on the 3.5 mile path. Faster walkers are encouraged to go ahead and catch up with the rest of us on the way back.

After the walk we will grab a snack or lunch at the local country store. They are noted for their homemade soups and unique sandwiches. YUMMMMM!

Please dress in layers for your confort, bring plenty of water, and some bug spray!

Participation in this event is at your own risk.

Contact Barb/Peanut at 603-540-7467.
item.how_to_find_us: LET'S MEET IN THE PARKING LOT. I WILL WEAR A MEETUP PIN.
item.name: MID-DAY MID-WEEK WALK AT THE WINDHAM RAIL TRAIL
